Sentencas: The development of reliable fuel cells power plant based on renewable fuels stands out as one of the promising energy systems solutions for the future.
Titulo: Process simulation of a SOFC and double bubbling fluidized bed gasifier power plant

Sentencas: Indeed fuel cells can increase the efficiency and the cleaning of the electrical energy production from renewable fuels.
Titulo: Process simulation of a SOFC and double bubbling fluidized bed gasifier power plant

Sentencas: Process simulations of advanced power plants fed by low cost renewable fuels like biomass waste are a key step to develop renewable resources based on high temperature fuel cells applications.
Titulo: Process simulation of a SOFC and double bubbling fluidized bed gasifier power plant

Sentencas: The aim of this work is to predict the component behaviour of a specific power plant mainly composed of a small indirectly heated gasifier and a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) and fed by chestnut coppice, waste available in great quantity in Central Italy, as well as in several other European regions.
Titulo: Process simulation of a SOFC and double bubbling fluidized bed gasifier power plant

Sentencas: The plant's thermodynamic behaviour is analysed by means of the process simulator CHEMCAD(C) in which particular models for the SOFC and the gasifier have been developed in FORTRAN by the authors and then interfaced to commercial software.
Titulo: Process simulation of a SOFC and double bubbling fluidized bed gasifier power plant

Sentencas: The results of the predictive model are presented and discussed, showing the possibility of an extremely interesting carbon neutral small plant configuration with high electrical and global efficiency exclusively based on the use of low cost renewable resources.
Titulo: Process simulation of a SOFC and double bubbling fluidized bed gasifier power plant
